description: Both pods are deployed in the same namespace, suggesting they are part of the same application stack. Sidecar containers should share the pod's network namespace for efficient localhost communication.
Both deployments have the same or similar replica counts, indicating synchronized scaling. This is a strong indicator that they should be part of the same pod specification.
The pods appear to have coupled lifecycles based on naming conventions, labels, or deployment timing. Sidecar containers should share the exact lifecycle of their main container.
